thag19.1:34.2: vupasamo dukhassa → vūpasamo dukkhassa (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed)
thag19.1:35.1: Taṇhā avijjā → taṇhaṁ virajjañca (sya1ed, sya2ed); taṇhaṁ avijjañca (pts1ed)
thag19.1:37.2: rājadasī → rājādisī (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr); rājadisī (pts1ed, pts2ed)
thag19.1:39.2: cāraṇikaṁva → vāraṇikaṁva (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts1ed) | dassayaṁ → dussahaṁ (sya1ed, sya2ed); dassahaṁ (pts1ed)
thag19.1:44.1: Dhitipparaṁ → dhī dhī paraṁ (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts1ed)
thag19.1:54.2: pāvusaabbhamāliniṁ → pāvisi abbhamālinaṁ (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts1ed, pts2ed); … māliṁ
thag19.1:54.3: ramissaṁ → ramissasi (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts1ed, pts2ed, mr)
